changeSet.author: Nastya
changeSet.sql: create table Role( roleId int(11) AUTO_INCREMENT, role varchar(20) NOT NULL, userId int(11), PRIMARY KEY (roleId));
changeSet.comment: This table describe role of users

changeSet.author: Nastya
changeSet.sql: create table User( userId int(11) AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(20), surname varchar(20), phone varchar(20), roleId int(11), PRIMARY KEY (userId), FOREIGN KEY (roleId) REFERENCES Role (roleId));

changeSet.author: Nastya
changeSet.sql: create table Message( messageId int(11) AUTO_INCREMENT, userId int(11), description varchar(20), PRIMARY KEY (messageId), FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES User (userId));
changeSet.comment: This table describe message of users

changeSet.author: Nastya
changeSet.sql: create table TagHome( tagId int(11) AUTO_INCREMENT, tagSimple varchar(20), messageId int(11), PRIMARY KEY (tagId), FOREIGN KEY (messageId) REFERENCES Message (messageId));
changeSet.comment: This table describe private message of users

changeSet.author: Nastya
changeSet.sql: create table TagWork( tagId int(11) AUTO_INCREMENT, tagImportant varchar(20), messageId int(11), PRIMARY KEY (tagId), FOREIGN KEY (messageId) REFERENCES Message (messageId));
changeSet.comment: This table describe work message of users
